name: Cintube
description: Cintube is a user-friendly video-sharing platform that allows user to watch and share the video. This is a youtube clone that made me to learn Using react js, working with APIS And using Material UI to design UI

name: VisualMorph
description: VisualMorph Allows user to make AI generate Image, download and share with friends.VisualMorph Helps me in learning React, Nodejs, Mongodb Atlas, Tailwindcss And also working with APIs
